name: Flatland: Another Perspective
description:
Flatland: Another Perspective is a 2D platformer that happens in a 3d world.  Play as a small color-changing, geometry fracturing slime as you try to reach the Silver Platform at the end of the level.  

When you are finished playing, please consider filling out this form so development can continue. If you really like this game, follow me on twitter (@zoeskarph) where I will be posting mini devlogs and updates on development.

The downloads here are strictly a pre-alpha and proof of concept, and as such, are very prone to glitches, crashes, and the like.

===CONTROLS===
left arrow: move left
right arrow: move right
up arrow: jump (green), jump out (purple)
down arrow: rewind jump out (purple)
z: slow down
spacebar: pause the game
escape: quit the game
